attributes.action: Recommend Ross Brawn for a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ross Brawn guided Michael Schumacker to seven world F1 titles and has now guided Jenson Button to his world championship.  Earlier this season Ross was forced to undertake a management buyout when Honda pulled out of F1, and his reconstructed team ended up as F1 constructors championship.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
